column4: I have /home on a separate partition.  I need to reinstall ubuntu.  Are there explicit instructions on how to do this without touching /home?  If I choose "Specify partitions manually", set the /home partition's mountpoint to /home, and specify that it should not be formatted, will that suffice?
nothing saves the day like a backup before something as drastic as this though.
Yep, I have a backup.  Thanks for the advice.
